ns2:DataStructureOrchestration:
ds_mssql_ibas 基于MSSQL的结构映射说明 true com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerDriver $$因存在创建数据的可能，所以数据库连接默认库。 jdbc:sqlserver://${DbServer}:${DbPort};DatabaseName=master;ApplicationName=${AppName} ${DbUser} ${DbPassword} $$"!"表示延迟解析变量，例如${!Property.getEditSize()} $$设置为隔离动作（Isolated = true），此动作独立数据库事务，若已存在事务，则提交。
select count(0) from sys.databases where name = '${DbName}'
create database "${DbName}"
$BEGIN_MODEL$
select count(0) from "${DbName}".sys.sysobjects where name = '${Model.getMapped()}' and type = 'u'
$$上步返回0时运行（RunOnValue="0"）。
create table "${DbName}"."${DbSchema}"."${Model.getMapped()}"( $BEGIN_MODEL_PROPERTY$ "${Property.getMapped()}" ${Property.getMappedType()} ${Property.getNullType()} ${Property.getSeparator(,)} $END_MODEL_PROPERTY$ )
$BEGIN_MODEL_PROPERTY$
select count(0) from "${DbName}".sys.syscolumns where object_name(id,db_id('${DbName}')) = '${Model.getMapped()}' and name = '${Property.getMapped()}'
alter table "${DbName}"."${DbSchema}"."${Model.getMapped()}" add "${Property.getMapped()}" ${Property.getMappedType()} ${Property.getNullType()}
$END_MODEL_PROPERTY$ $BEGIN_MODEL_HAS_PRIMARY$
select count(0) from "${DbName}".sys.sysobjects where xtype = 'PK' AND object_name(id,db_id('${DbName}')) = 'K${Model.getMapped().toUpperCase()}'
alter table "${DbName}"."${DbSchema}"."${Model.getMapped()}" add constraint "K${Model.getMapped().toUpperCase()}" primary key ( $BEGIN_MODEL_PRIMARY_PROPERTY$ "${Property.getMapped()}" ${Property.getSeparator(,)} $END_MODEL_PRIMARY_PROPERTY$ )
$END_MODEL_HAS_PRIMARY$
$BEGIN_MODEL_HAS_UNIQUE$
select count(0) from "${DbName}".sys.indexes where object_name(object_id,db_id('${DbName}'))='${Model.getMapped()}' and name = '${Model.getMapped().toUpperCase()}_UNIQUE_INDEX'
drop index "${Model.getMapped().toUpperCase()}_UNIQUE_INDEX" on "${DbName}"."${DbSchema}"."${Model.getMapped()}"
create unique index "${Model.getMapped().toUpperCase()}_UNIQUE_INDEX" on "${DbName}"."${DbSchema}"."${Model.getMapped()}" ( $BEGIN_MODEL_UNIQUE_PROPERTY$ "${Property.getMapped()}" ${Property.getSeparator(,)} $END_MODEL_UNIQUE_PROPERTY$ )
$END_MODEL_HAS_UNIQUE$ $END_MODEL$ $BEGIN_BO$
select count(0) from "${DbName}".sys.sysobjects where name = '${Company}_SYS_ONNM' and type = 'u'
select count(0) from "${DbName}"."${DbSchema}"."${Company}_SYS_ONNM" where "ObjectCode" = N'${BO.getShortName()}'
insert into "${DbName}"."${DbSchema}"."${Company}_SYS_ONNM" ("ObjectCode", "AutoKey", "DocSubType") values (N'${BO.getShortName()}', 1, '--')
$BEGIN_BO_MODEL$
select count(0) from "${DbName}".sys.sysobjects where name = '${Company}_SYS_OBOI' and type = 'u'
delete from "${DbName}"."${DbSchema}"."${Company}_SYS_OBOI" where "Name" = N'${Model.getName()}'

select count(0) from "${DbName}".sys.sysobjects where name = '${Company}_SYS_BOI1' and type = 'u'
$BEGIN_MODEL_PROPERTY$
delete from "${DbName}"."${DbSchema}"."${Company}_SYS_BOI1" where "Name" = N'${Model.getName()}' and "Property" = N'${Property.getName()}'
insert into "${DbName}"."${DbSchema}"."${Company}_SYS_BOI1" ("Name", "Property", "Mapped", "Descrp", "DataType", "EditType", "EditSize", "Searched", "Systemed") VALUES(N'${Model.getName()}', N'${Property.getName()}', N'${Property.getMapped()}', N'${Property.getDescription()}', N'${Property.getDataType()}', N'${Property.getDataSubType()}', ${Property.getEditSize()}, N'${Property.isPrimaryKey(DB)}', N'Y')
$END_MODEL_PROPERTY$
$END_BO_MODEL$ $BEGIN_BOITEM$ $BEGIN_BOITEM_MODEL$
